content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello, Ryanah Rahman. It's good to meet you. I'm Heinrich Heine, the landlord of this 25-square-meter apartment. I understand that you're interested in renting it. Let's discuss the price. What amount were you considering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine, for showing me the apartment. It's exactly what I'm looking for. As a student, I'm on a tight budget, so I was hoping for a price that reflects the size of the apartment. I was thinking around $1,200 per month. What do you think?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Ryanah, $1,200 per month is a very reasonable offer considering the size of the apartment. However, as a landlord, I'm always looking to get the best deal for my property. Would you be willing to negotiate a bit higher? Perhaps $1,250?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I appreciate your time and effort, Mr. Heine. Your counter-offer of $1,250 is quite fair. As a student, I'm looking for a place that's not only affordable but also comfortable. I'm willing to pay $1,250 per month for the apartment. Is that acceptable to you?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Ryanah, your willingness to meet in the middle is greatly appreciated. I'm pleased to hear that you're willing to pay $1,250 per month for the apartment. That is indeed acceptable to me. I agree to the price of $1,250. Thank you for your cooperation in finding a fair deal.
name: Heinrich Heine
